document.full_text: leading by 1 up and with christie kerr facing a 10-foot birdie attempt on the 18th hole, suzann pettersen curled in a left to-right 15-footer for birdie to seal her first victory in 20 months.
document.title: making last putt count, pettersen holds off kerr
lines_and_colors: leading by 1 up and with christie kerr facing a 10-foot birdie attempt on the 18th hole, suzann pettersen curled in a left to-right 15-footer for birdie to seal her first victory in 20 months.
